reviewText: A pure & innocent boy's journey into manhood in order to protect his true love.  It's never too early for love; love has no age limit.  What a whimsical yet charming fairytale! A must see!

I finally bought this series and I'm glad that I did.  It was one of those that you wanted to keep watching and not stop until it was over.  a 14 year old boy has an overnight grwoing spurt that ages him around 11 years to be a 25 year old man after an encounter with an antique sundial and Lee Tae Ri in her family's museum.  It all gets twisted and turned from there, because of old boyfriends, a selfish and conniving pop star, greedy uncles and arranged marriages.  It's a perfect Kdrama!

The only drawback was that the subtitles were done by Viki.com. Sometimes the translated English needed to be translated.  Krama addicts know what I mean.  You could tell that it was either done by an online translator or someone with not very good English speaking skills.  In places the translations got better, so they weren't as distracting from the series.  In parts, there was no subtitling and you had to guess what was being said.  i wish they had used Dramafever as the subtitling company instead.  They do a better job.  Fortunately, the series was good enough to still want to watch it all the way through and deal with the subtitling along the way.  I really need to learn Korean, so this is not an issue.

In fact i watch it first in TV, i recently watch another dorama and thought I was not going to like this one like the previous... I was totally mistaken... The plot is very unique, and Kim Ki Bum is so sexy!

I recommend this Drama very much.

Hope my comment was useful for your purchase =)

Les comento que este Dorama lo vi en TV, no pensaba verlo porque sucede que recien habia terminado de ver otro, y pense que no me gustaria tanto.. Pero me equivoque... El trama es unico y Kim Ki Bum es tan sexy...

Les recomiendo mucho este drama, me cautivo la verdad... Ya no me arrepiento de haberla visto y por eso decidi comprarla...

Espero que este review te haya sido util. Subtitulos solo en Coreano e Ingles.  =)
